climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: HEAVY DUTY, INDOOR/OUTDOOR: Made from water resistant polyester fabric that can be used indoors or outdoors. Use these thick, canvas-like textured curtains to set the mood in your outdoor space, create privacy, and block sunlight while you relax.
CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Spot clean and/or hand wash. Use iron on low heat to straighten and remove creases/wrinkles from packaging.

HOOK-AND-LOOP TAB TOP: These two curtain panels feature a hook-and-loop fastened tab top per curtain panel with an inside diameter for curtain rod measures 1.5"- each panel sewn with 3" heading; 3" bottom hem.
SET OF TWO CURTAIN PANELS: Includes two (2) curtain panels, each measuring 54"W x 96"L.

HEAVY-DUTY, CANVAS-LIKE PANELS: These polyester panels offer a heavy-duty, canvas-like feel fabric. The simple yet stately, polished look makes them a gorgeous addition to any outdoor extension of your home.
body.description: The Exclusive Home Cabana Solid Indoor/Outdoor Light Filtering Hook-and-Loop Tab Top Curtain Panels are designed to add style to any space. These polyester curtain panels offer a heavy-duty canvas like feel and are UV ray protected. Constructed with sturdy hook-and-loop fastened tab tops, these curtain panels are UV ray protected, and water resistant and can be hung on a curtain rod up to 1.5" diameter. Perfect for blocking the sun, creating more privacy, or setting the mood in your indoor or outdoor living space.

productInformation.name: Care instructions

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Exclusive Home Curtain Panels Exclusive Home's variety of curtains are limitless. With geometric curtains, floral curtains, medallion curtains, and other patterned curtains in multiple sizes and constructions, there isn't an interior design or home decor we can't complete. From classic solids to today’s top fashion trends, you are sure to find window panels to fit any look, mood, or style to complete your home décor. Curtain Rods From classic to contemporary designs, you are sure to find Exclusive Home curtain rods that will fit any look, mood or style and complement your window decor. Like millions of customers already have, let our designs be the anchor for each room in your home! Our window hardware collections are available in a variety of styles, colors and sizes. Indoor/Outdoor Let your worries blow away in the wind! Exclusive Home has the perfect outdoor curtains for your patio, lanai, porch, or any other outdoor area. Featuring a multitude of colors and designs, our outdoor curtains bring extra fashion and style to any outdoor living space. Our outdoor curtain panels drape beautifully and offer a UV Ray protectant. These beautiful panels are the ultimate finishing touch to any pergola, cabana, covered patio, gazebo, dock, beach home, or any outdoor extension of your home. Kids Exclusive Home's bright and fun kids curtains are perfect to help keep the sun out for that midday nap! With a variety of colors and sizes, there is no kid decor we can't match. Offering a variety of styles in chevron, geometric, and stripe designs. Impress your family and friends with your kid's rooms new curtains!

Why Exclusive Home: Our ready-made curtains are offered in an array of standard sizes sure to accompany the window and setting for any setting. You will find widths per panel ranging from 40 inches to 108 inch patio panel, and lengths offered in 63", 84", 96" and 108". Regardless of your application, you are sure to find ready to hang curtains for your home from us! Why Exclusive Home: With Exclusive Home Curtains quality is paired with fabric that provides texture, depth, and sophistication. These constructions include jacquards, linen, burlap, sheer, thermal / blackout, layered curtains, silk and faux silks, polyester and poly blends, and cotton and cotton blends. Further, we offer multiple top treatment options, including grommets, rod pocket / pole top, back tab, pinch pleat, clip ring, and more. Why Exclusive Home: After producing and selling millions of curtains for well over a decade, the Exclusive Home product line is held to the highest quality standards for finished product. With every purchase will receive a professionally constructed curtain set that is sure to hang beautifully. Why Exclusive Home: From sheer to fully lined blackout, and everything in between, Exclusive Home Curtains has the window treatments to fit the light blocking needs you have. For simplicity, we utilize an opacity rating for each product to simplify the items light blocking qualities. Purchase with confidence, knowing how light will be filtered with each panel. Sizes Construction Quality Opacity

Exclusive Home Curtains - About Us: Exclusive Home Curtains is North America’s leading supplier of home textiles and ready-made drapery for delivering high fashion designs, patterns, varying textures, and colors in an affordable luxury quality that today’s consumers expect. From classic solids to today’s top fashion trends, you are sure to find window panels to fit any look, mood, or style to complete your home décor project. We offer an array of fabric constructions as well, including jacquards, linen, burlap, sheer, thermal / blackout, silk and faux silks, polyester and poly blends, and cotton and cotton blends. These constructions are offered in varying designs and colors including solids, prints, geometric, gates, medallions, vertical stripes, horizontal stripes, embroidery, textures, thickness, lengths, widths, and burnouts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely curtains for my patio!!!
reviews.reviewText: Love my new curtains for my patio!! The material is not a cheap feeling material. They are not see-through which is perfect for my needs. Very easy to install with the tab top and they are water-resistantha e had several heavy rains and so far so good they are holding up very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Best outdoor curtains money can buy. Going on their 3rd year in the Kentucky elements and look great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love them
reviews.reviewText: Great deal for how much they cost. They’re gorgeous I wish I bought more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality all the way
reviews.reviewText: Purchased these instead of using a roll up blind to keep the harsh sun out. Love tying them back for a cabana look and then closing them for privacy and shade. These are a good weight (not sheer) and very expensive looking. They do not wrinkle and stay dirt free for the most part. The water just rolls off of them as well which is an added plus. Great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2021
reviews.reviewText: With the lockdown we haven’t been going anywhere. We needed to create a sanctuary in our backyard to just get out of the house. Bought these curtains as a way to replicate being in a Hawaiian oasis. They worked beautifully. Attached them to shower rods inside our arbor and they fall to the perfect length. Not see through which is what I wanted. We get pelted by the sun in the late afternoon and having these curtains to open up and block the sun is the perfect retreat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love
reviews.reviewText: First, i’d like to say that I do a lot of research before making a purchase. I Can’t say enough about these curtains!!! I bought these to replace the IKEA curtains I had on my deck. IKEA curtains were more like a netting then a curtain (then again you get what you pay for) and were ultimately destroyed by squirrels... The bane of my existence. These curtains are of very good quality. Thick enough to bear the storm yet soft enough to beautify your space. I loved that I did not have to use clips to put these up. Instead they have Velcro tabs that are easy to put up and remove for washing. I’m so so pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful addition!Just buy them! Worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this curtains it make my whole room bright in the quality is amazing I will buy them again
reviews.reviewText: Love this curtains it make my whole room bright in the quality is amazing I will buy them again
I bought those curtains for my balcony to create Greek look. Looks great. Wonderful, thick and shiny material.
